name: Spinning
description: Spinning is a high-intensity indoor cycling workout that improves cardiovascular health and strengthens lower body muscles.

name: Pilates
description: Pilates is a system of exercises focused on improving flexibility, strength, and body awareness. It is ideal for strengthening the core and improving posture.

name: Boxing
description: Boxing is a high-intensity sport that improves strength, coordination, and cardiovascular fitness through punches and defensive moves.

name: CrossFit
description: CrossFit is a strength and conditioning workout that combines elements of weightlifting, aerobics, and gymnastics to build endurance, strength, and agility.

name: Aerobics
description: Aerobics is a cardio workout that focuses on rhythmic exercises to improve cardiovascular endurance and burn calories.

name: Yoga
description: Yoga is a mind-body practice that combines physical postures, breathing exercises, and meditation to promote relaxation and improve flexibility.

name: Functional Training
description: Functional training focuses on exercises that mimic everyday movements, helping to improve strength, balance, and coordination.

name: Zumba
description: Zumba is a high-energy dance fitness program that combines Latin and international music with fun dance moves.
